00076 using namespace std;
00077 
00078 //=======================================================================
00079 //
00080 // fitness function: Ackley's function
00081 //
00082 double ackley( const vector< double >& x )
00083 {
00084     const double A = 20.;
00085     const double B = 0.2;
00086     const double C = Pi2;
00087 
00088     unsigned i, n;
00089     double   a, b;
00090 
00091     for( a = b = 0., i = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; ++i ) {
00092         a += x[ i ] * x[ i ];
00093         b += cos( C * x[ i ] );
00094     }
00095 
00096     return -A * exp( -B * sqrt( a / n ) ) - exp( b / n ) + A + E;
00097 }

00100 //=======================================================================
00101 //
00102 // main program
00103 //
00104 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00105 {
00106     //
00107     // constants
00108     //
00109     const unsigned Mu           = 15;
00110     const unsigned Lambda       = 100;
00111     const unsigned Dimension    = 30;
00112     const unsigned Iterations   = 500;
00113     const unsigned Interval     = 10;
00114     const unsigned NSigma       = 1;
00115 
00116     const double   MinInit      = -3;
00117     const double   MaxInit      = +15;
00118     const double   SigmaInit    = 3;
00119 
00120     const bool     PlusStrategy = false;
00121 
00122     const char*    LockFile     = "saveState.lock";
00123     const char*    TmpFile      = "saveState.tmp";
00124 
00125     const unsigned Precision    = 16;
00126 
00127     unsigned       i, t;
00128 
00129     ifstream       loadFile;
00130     ofstream       saveFile;
00131     ofstream       logFile;
00132 
00133     //
00134     // initialize random number generator
00135     //
00136     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00137 
00138     //
00139     // define populations
00140     //
00141     Population parents   ( Mu,     ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00142                                    ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma    ) );
00143     Population offsprings( Lambda, ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00144                                    ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma    ) );
00145 
00146     //
00147     // minimization task
00148     //
00149     parents   .setMinimize( );
00150     offsprings.setMinimize( );
00151 
00152     //
00153     // initialize parent population
00154     //
00155     for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00156         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( MinInit,   MaxInit   );
00157         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 1 ] ).initialize( SigmaInit, SigmaInit );
00158     }
00159 
00160     //
00161     // selection parameters (number of elitists)
00162     //
00163     unsigned numElitists = PlusStrategy ? Mu : 0;
00164 
00165     //
00166     // standard deviations for mutation of sigma
00167     //
00168     double   tau0 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * Dimension );
00169     double   tau1 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * sqrt( ( double )Dimension ) );
00170 
00171     //
00172     // evaluate parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00173     //
00174     if( PlusStrategy )
00175         for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00176             parents[ i ].setFitness( ackley( dynamic_cast< vector< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00177 
00178     //
00179     // check whether a process was/is running (lock file exists)
00180     //
00181     loadFile.open( LockFile );
00182 
00183     if( loadFile ) {
00184         //
00185         // load current state
00186         //
00187         loadFile >> t;
00188         Rng::readFrom( loadFile );
00189         loadFile >> parents >> offsprings;
00190 
00191         if( ! loadFile ) {
00192             cerr << "error: read failed on file " << LockFile << endl;
00193             exit( 1 );
00194         }
00195 
00196         loadFile.close( );
00197     } else
00198         t = 0; // reset number of generations
00199 
00200     //
00201     // iterate
00202     //
00203     for( ; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00204         //
00205         // generate new offsprings
00206         //
00207         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ) {
00208             //
00209             // select two random parents
00210             //
00211             Individual& mom = parents.random( );
00212             Individual& dad = parents.random( );
00213 
00214             //
00215             // define temporary references for convenience
00216             //
00217             ChromosomeT< double >& objvar = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] );
00218             ChromosomeT< double >& sigma  = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 1 ] );
00219 
00220             //
00221             // recombine object variables discrete, step sizes intermediate
00222             //
00223             objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( mom[ 0 ], dad[ 0 ] );
00224             sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( mom[ 1 ], dad[ 1 ] );
00225 
00226             //
00227             // mutate object variables normal distributed,
00228             // step sizes log normal distributed
00229             //
00230             sigma .mutateLogNormal( tau0,  tau1 );
00231             objvar.mutateNormal   ( sigma, true );
00232         }
00233 
00234         //
00235         // evaluate objective function (parameters in chromosome #0)
00236         //
00237         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00238             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( ackley( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00239 
00240         //
00241         // select (mu,lambda) or (mu+lambda)
00242         //
00243         parents.selectMuLambda( offsprings, numElitists );
00244 
00245         if( t % Interval == 0 ) {
00246             //
00247             // save current state,
00248             // use temporary file in order to avoid inconsistent states
00249             //
00250             saveFile.open( TmpFile );
00251             if( ! saveFile ) {
00252                 cerr << "error: can't open file " << TmpFile << endl;
00253                 exit( 1 );
00254             }
00255             saveFile << setprecision( Precision );
00256             saveFile << t+1 << endl;
00257             Rng::writeTo( saveFile );
00258             saveFile << parents << offsprings;
00259             if( ! saveFile ) {
00260                 cerr << "error: can't write to file " << TmpFile << endl;
00261                 exit( 1 );
00262             }
00263             saveFile.close( );
00264 #ifdef _WIN32
00265             //
00266             // windows doesn't overwrite existing files
00267             // so remove old file before renaming new file
00268             //
00269             if( t > 0 )   // lock file exists
00270                 if( unlink( LockFile ) != 0 ) {
00271                     perror( argv[ 0 ] );
00272                     cerr << "error: can't unlink file " << LockFile << endl;
00273                     exit( 1 );
00274                 }
00275 #endif
00276             if( rename( TmpFile, LockFile ) != 0 ) {
00277                 perror( argv[ 0 ] );
00278                 cerr << "error: can't rename temporary file to " << LockFile << endl;
00279                 exit( 1 );
00280             }
00281 
00282             //
00283             // print out best value found so far
00284             //
00285             cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00286                  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << endl;
00287         }
00288     }
00289 
00290     //
00291     // clean up and unlink an existing lock file
00292     //
00293     if( unlink( LockFile ) != 0 ) {
00294         perror( argv[ 0 ] );
00295         cerr << "error: can't unlink file " << LockFile << endl;
00296         exit( 1 );
00297     }
00298 
00299     return 0;
00300 }
